summary: This document is an internal email correspondence discussing the transfer of assets related to Epstein. It includes communications between associates at Deutsche Bank regarding the logistics of the asset transfer to Pershing LLC, with a suggestion to delay the process until the following Monday.

persons.name: Vahe Stepanian
persons.context: Vahe Stepanian is mentioned as an associate at Deutsche Bank Securities Inc., involved in the asset transfer process.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, forwarding information about the asset transfer related to Epstein.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is included in the email chain regarding the asset transfer process.

persons.name: Janet E Young
persons.context: Janet E Young is mentioned as the sender of the email summarizing the assets to be transferred.

persons.name: Harry Baller
persons.context: Harry Baller is referenced as having suggested to wait until Monday to proceed with the asset transfer.

connections.description: Both are associates at Deutsche Bank involved in the asset transfer discussions.
Amanda Kirby includes Paul Morris in the email chain regarding the asset transfer.
Amanda Kirby references Harry Baller's suggestion regarding the timing of the asset transfer.
Janet E Young forwards information to Amanda Kirby about the assets to be transferred.

events.title: Asset Transfer Discussion
events.description: Internal discussions regarding the transfer of assets related to Epstein to Pershing LLC.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 26th Floor, New York, NY 10154

keyFacts: The document discusses the transfer of assets related to Epstein.
Vahe Stepanian and Amanda Kirby are associates at Deutsche Bank involved in the asset transfer.
Harry Baller suggested delaying the asset transfer until the following Monday.
The assets are being transferred to Pershing LLC.
The email correspondence is marked as confidential.
